com.thoughtworks.robot.locations
Interface LocationParser

All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseLocationParser
public interface LocationParser

Location parser interface which must be implemented by all location parser classes which will perform location string parsing.

Example usage: Let's say you have introduced a new Location code B (Back) other than existing (L, M, R) and you don't want to use BaseLocationParser, rather you want to write you own parser then you can write a new parser by implementing this interface and pass it as argument to Robot.

Author:
sshinde
See Also:
LocationParser, Location, Coordinate, Direction
